name: 蘇文郁
objective: 本課程講述各種生醫材料之材料微結構、性質與製程，並對金屬、陶瓷及高分子材料之各種特性與生醫用途做一介紹。並針對生醫材料在硬組織、軟組織與組織工程等相關領域之應用，以協助同學瞭解各種生醫材料之性質需求與臨床上使用可能產生之生物反應，建立學生在生醫材料研究發展之基礎知識。
schedule:
Week 1  Introduction to Biomaterials

Part I
Week 2  Fundamentals of Materials
Week 3  Surface characterization of materials 
Week 4-5  Metallic Implant Materials
Week 5-6 Ceramic Implant Materials
Week 7-8 Polymeric Implant Materials
Week 9  Mid Exam

Part II
Week 10  Host Reaction to Biomaterials
Week 11-12  Biological Testing of Biomaterials
Week 12-13  Degradation of Materials in the Biological Environment
Week 14-15  Soft Tissue Replacement
Week 15-16  Hard Tissue Replacement
Week 17 Tissue Engineering
Week 18 Final Exam
materials:
